markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6506) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 234 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

You can use the [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) activity to create [snares](/Equipment.aspx?Category=31). When you select this feat, you immediately add the formulas for four common 1st-level snares to your formula book.
name: Snare Crafting

summary_markdown: You can use the [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) activity to create [snares](/Equipment.aspx?Category=31).
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Snare Crafting Source Player Core 2 pg. 234 1.1 Prerequisites Trained in Crafting --- You can use the Craft activity to create snares. When you select this feat, you immediately add the formulas for four common 1st-level snares to your formula book.
